channel.title: [req] Problem with dragon Claws and other errors
channel.description:
In my server Dclaws is automatically set for 60 def so i had no choice to change it to 1 def by changing dragon armour to 1def Why? Because My server sees it as a Dragon Defence armour What do i need help with? I need some help on how to make dclaws 1def without making all dragon items 1def -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- And another thing, why do my models get messed up like i put anchor models which wasn't a .DAT file but it was a .File and anchors code into class8.java then complied then saw my void top model got messed up it was invisible all you could see is a toy horsey on Ur self. I think that i need to convert the .FILE to a .DAT Or its cuz of the silab model which got put into the Delta.
Thanks a lot.

item.title: [req] Problem with dragon Claws and other errors
item.dc:creator: @cowbell cowbell
item.description:
@cowbell wrote:

In my server Dclaws is automatically set for 60 def so i had no choice to change it to 1 def by changing dragon armour to 1def
Why?
Because My server sees it as a Dragon Defence armour
What do i need help with?
I need some help on how to make dclaws 1def without making all dragon items 1def

And another thing, why do my models get messed up like
i put anchor models which wasnâ€™t a .DAT file but it was a .File and anchors code into class8.java
then complied then saw my void top model got messed up it was invisible all you could see is a toy horsey on Ur self.
I think that i need to convert the .FILE to a .DAT Or its cuz of the silab model which got put into the Delta.

Thanks a lot.
